import React from "react"; import "./ProductListItem.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import mockList from '../../data/ItemsData' const ProductListItem = ({ content, onSelect }) => { const productPrice = content.productPriceFormatted.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); return (
  • {content.productName}
  • {productPrice}원 {content.productPromotion}%
  • {content.productInfo}
  • 리뷰 {content.productReview} 평점 * {content.productGrade}/5
) }; //ProductList export default ProductListItem;
